bug.short_desc: squidGuard logrotate config uses wildcard incorrectly
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
This commit:
http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/squidGuard.git/commit/squidGuard.logrotate?id=49bcffb599b674138534d759064ae952d7cf1730
Removed the olddir directive, which then leads to all files in the squidGuard log directory being rotated. After a while, the names become too long.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): squidGuard-1.4-26.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: Always.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Just let logrotate do its job.
Actual results: All files get rotated, instead of just log files.
Expected results: Old config moved old logs into olddir.
Additional info: Either reinstate olddir or use *.log instead of * as the pattern.
